items.name: Mageblood
explicitMods: Magic Utility Flasks cannot be Used
Leftmost 4 Magic Utility Flasks constantly apply their Flask Effects to you
Magic Utility Flask Effects cannot be removed
flavourText: Rivers of power course through your veins.

craftedMods: 25% reduced Mana Cost of Skills during Effect

items.name: Storm Cloud
flavourText: Centuries of development in steel armoursmithing
turned the armies of the Eternal Empire

items.name: Profane Proxy
explicitMods: +3 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
Left Ring Slot: Your Chilling Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead
Right Ring Slot: Your Shocking Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead
flavourText: The machines do not hate. They merely serve one who does.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Cold, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their cold resistance and giving them a chance to be frozen when hit.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -37% to Cold Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Freeze
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Ralakesh's Impatience
explicitMods:
Count as having maximum number of Endurance Charges
Count as having maximum number of Frenzy Charges
Count as having maximum number of Power Charges
flavourText: The Master of a Million Faces lived by one
simple ethos: why make the effort, when
you can simply mimic what others have?

items.name: Horror Fingers
implicitMods: While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, Inflict Cold Exposure on Hit, applying -15% to Cold Resistance
20% chance to Unnerve Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit
craftedMods: 30% reduced Effect of Chill and Shock on you

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +24% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: 100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Detonates a Mine, starting a Detonation Sequence which will detonate other Mines around it.
explicitMods:
First Mine Detonates Instantly
Mines get 10% more Detonation Speed for each prior Mine in Detonation Sequence
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 74% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: Rathpith Globe
explicitMods: Sacrifice 10% of your Life when you Use or Trigger a Spell Skill
5% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells per 100 Player Maximum Life
5% increased Spell Damage per 100 Player Maximum Life
flavourText: The Vaal emptied their slaves of beating hearts,
and left a mountain of twitching dead.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby allies have 39% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 15% more Spell Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Trap, Mine, Spell, Minion, Cold, Lightning, AoE, Aura

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon a Chilling Skitterbot and a Shocking Skitterbot, which will trigger your traps and detonate your mines. Mines detonated by Skitterbots will re-arm and can then be detonated again. The Skitterbots grant you more trap and mine damage, and cannot be targeted or damaged.
explicitMods: Maximum 1 Summoned Skitterbot of each type
Chilling Skitterbot's Aura Chills Enemies near it
Shocking Skitterbot's Aura Shocks Enemies near it
Skitterbots grant 10% more Trap and Mine Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1738.6 Base Fire Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Glyph Eye
implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness on Hit

items.name: Torment Guardian
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Trap And Mine Damage
Socketed Gems deal 30% more Damage while on Low Life
Socketed Spells have +3% to Critical Strike Chance

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spells, or attacks that use bows or wands. Instead of using that skill, you will throw a mine that will use the skill for you when you detonate it. Mines cannot use channelling skills.
explicitMods: Supported Attack Skills cannot be used with Melee Weapons
Supported Skills gain a Base Reservation equal to Base Mana and Life Cost
Supported Skills have a Base Mine Detonation Time of 0.25 seconds
Each Mine from Supported Skills applies 2% chance to deal Double Damage to Hits against Enemies near it, up to a maximum of 100%
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills which throw mines.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 5% increased Mine Throwing Speed
Supported Skills can have up to 3 additional Remote Mines placed at a time
Supported Skills throw up to 4 additional Mines
Supported Skills have 46% less Mine Throwing Speed
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that deals damage.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 39% more Chaos Damage

Supported Skills deal no Elemental Damage
+1 to Level of Supported Chaos Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Deals chaos damage to a single enemy, dealing more damage if they are Hexed, then removing the Hex. If the enemy was Hexed, also deals area damage to other enemies around the target, boosting damage and removing Hexes from those enemies in the same way.
explicitMods: This Spell's Cast Time is added to its Cooldown if Triggered
All Damage can Ignite, Freeze, and Shock
Chaos Damage with Hits is Resisted by lowest Resistance instead
40% more Damage with Ailments if Enemy is Hexed
100% more Damage with Hits if Enemy is Hexed
100% chance to remove a Hex after Damaging
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Dire Thirst
explicitMods: +1 to Level of all Spell Skill Gems
+1 to Level of all Chaos Spell Skill Gems

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that are not triggered. Instead of casting that spell, you will summon a totem that casts the spell for you.
explicitMods: Supported Skills will summon a Totem which uses that Skill
Supported Skills have 40% less Cast Speed
Supported Skills have 10% increased Totem Placement speed

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts a debilitating debuff on enemies in an area, hindering their movement and also inflicts the Withered debuff, which increases the Chaos Damage they take and can stack up to 15 times.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Badge of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: Your Maximum Frenzy Charges is equal to your Maximum Power Charges
10% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Travel Skills per Frenzy Charge
9% increased Effect of Elusive on you per Power Charge
20% chance to lose a Frenzy Charge when you use a Travel Skill
24% chance to lose a Power Charge when you gain Elusive
flavourText: Greater than any blade, agility and intellect will be your weapons.
